Key Match Events: Giants' pitcher Kyle Harrison struggled in the fifth inning, allowing five runs, leading to a 5-3 loss to the Brewers
Post-Match Reflections: Giants manager Bob Melvin noted Harrison's strong start but pointed out the team's inability to score early
Brewers' players and manager reflected on the comeback victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Brewers held the Giants' offense to three runs, with Freddy Peralta pitching six scoreless innings
Giants' offense was held in check early but managed to score three runs in the seventh and eighth innings
